item.title: Boosting Structured Additive Regression Models
item.description: Boosting Structured Additive Regression Models This Shiny app allows you to explore the boosting structured additive regression models interactively. Feel free to adjust the parameters and explore the different features of the model. If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to reach out.
